text: In and Out is a Canadian animated short film, directed by Alison Snowden and David Fine and released in 1989.Mark A. Simon, Producing Independent 2D Character Animation: Making & Selling A Short Film. CRC Press, 2013. . Chapter 51, "Alison Snowden and David Fine: Academy Award-Winning Producers of Bob and Margaret". ==Summary== The film tells the story of a man's life from birth to old age."Animation fans get the best feast ever". Vancouver Sun, September 8, 1989. ==Accolades== The film received a Genie Award nomination for Best Animated Short Film at the 11th Genie Awards in 1990."Jesus film leads Genies". Ottawa Citizen, February 13, 1990. ==References== ==See also== *George and Rosemary *Bob's Birthday ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian animated short films Category:Films directed by Alison Snowden and David Fine Category:1989 animated films Category:1980s animated short films Category:Films without speech Category:Films about death
title: In and Out (1989 film)
